inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: according to the IOTF criteria (Cole TJ et al., 2000)

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: pubertal stage ≥ 3 according to the Tanner stage (Tanner et al., 1961)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Serum Zinc level in the range of normality or under the normal levels

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Adverse reactions to the product or component of the product (allergies…)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Genetic obesity (Prader Willi syndrome, Down syndrome), Metabolic obesity

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Chronic diseases, hepatic or gastroenterological diseases

notes: A 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
